_source.short_desc: Interactive dashboards, ad hoc analysis, proactive intelligence, real-time predictive analytics and mobile analytics.
_source.long_desc: Oracle Business Intelligence is a portfolio of technology and applications that provides the industry's first integrated, end-to-end Enterprise Performance Management System, including BI foundation, integrated array of query, reporting, analysis, alerting, and mobile analytics. Allows users to uncover new insights and make faster, more informed business decisions.
_source.target_audience: Oracle Business Intelligence offers a platform that serves enterprise analytics and comprehensive self service data discovery.

category_features.name: Ad hoc Reporting
category_features.definition: Generate reports that meet information requirement, as the occasion requires

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Key Performance Indicators
category_features.definition: Important metrics on which company is evaluated

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Profitability Analysis
category_features.definition: Evaluate the degree to which business operations bring monetary gains

category_features.name: Publishing / Sharing
category_features.definition: Share pre-configured sets of data organized and presented in a specific manner with the organization

category_features.name: Scorecards
category_features.definition: Capture statistical records to measure achievements or progress towards  a particular goal.

category_features.name: Strategic Planning
category_features.definition: At a high level, visualize a preferred outcome, define goals and identify specific steps to achieve them

category_features.name: Trend / Problem Indicators
category_features.definition: Visually identify direction of development and areas that require attention

category_features.name: Visual Analytics
category_features.definition: Interact with data visualization elements, such as charts and graphs, to drill down into data

related_products.short_desc: Tableau helps people and organizations become more data-driven as the trusted leader in analytics. Learn More!
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite analytics and business intelligence capabilities provide the data and insights businesses need to make better decisions.
related_products.features: NetSuite cloud business management solution centralizes all financial and operational data across a company to provide the business intelligence and reporting needed to improve decision-making.  SuiteAnalytics pre-built, customizable reports and workbooks, role-based dashboards, and KPIs deliver the data needed to help run your business while, NetSuite Analytics Warehouse consolidates NetSuite and non-NetSuite data to help gain even deeper insights into issues, trends and opportunities.

related_products.short_desc:
Workforce Analytics for the Modern ?Workplace
Understand how your team works - from everywhere! Empower your people, hone healthy work
related_products.features: ActivTrak's workforce analytics provide predictive insights that help leaders, managers, and employees build trust, deepen engagement and boost productivity in the modern, hybrid workplace. This work is supported by the ActivTrak Productivity Lab, a global center for ground-breaking research and expertise that leverages data sourced from more than 9,000 customers and over 550,000 users.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free total business management and BI suite used by 8 million companies. CRM, tasks, projects, documents, email, more.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is total business management  and business intelligence software that's 100% free. You get over 35 free tools, like CRM, tasks, document management, project management, time management, business process automation, invoicing, collaboration, absence management, email marketing, virtual PBX, shared calendars, company directory, HRMS and much more. Available in cloud and as software that you can install on your own server, it's ready to be used in less than 30 seconds.

related_products.short_desc: Web, on-prem and mobile solutions to help businesses with mapping, data management, predictive modeling, geocoding and more.
related_products.features: Integrated collection of GIS software products; ArcGIS offers unique capabilities and flexible licensing for applying location-based analytics to your business practices. Gain greater insights using contextual tools to visualize and analyze your data. Collaborate and share via maps, apps, dashboards and reports.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: #1 Cloud-Native Financial Management System. Achieve real-time visibility, drive efficiency through automation, & grow with confidence.
related_products.features: Sage Intacct's cloud-native financial management system automates financial processes and captures data in real time so you can make agile data-driven decisions. Transform your business strategy with trusted insights from a partner who thrives off of automation. AI fuels our ability to continuously monitor transactions, automate routine tasks, and even make recommendations. These features are seamless, working in the background while you focus on what matters most-driving your business forward.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights on your business information.
related_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

related_products.short_desc: The modern BI platform that works seamlessly with your existing technology.
related_products.features:
Build a modern business, driven by data.
Connect to any data source to bring your data together into one unified view, then make analytics available to drive insight-based actions-all while maintaining security and control.

related_products.short_desc: Qlik Sense is a business intelligence (BI) and visual analytics platform that helps global enterprises move faster and work smarter.
related_products.features: Qlik Sense is world-class business intelligence software that helps global enterprises move faster, work smarter and put modern analytics in everyone's hands. Easily combine, load, visualize, and explore data, no matter how large (or small). Create and share powerful, interactive dashboards in a governable environment. Get unmatched performance and scalability  on enterprise SaaS, your cloud of choice, or on-premises. Accelerate your path to business value with the most complete BI platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.

Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions.

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

similar_products.short_desc: Wyn Enterprise provides BI reporting, interactive dashboards, scheduling, and distribution tools within any internal or commercial app.
similar_products.features: Wyn Enterprise is a seamless embedded business intelligence platform that provides BI reporting, interactive dashboards, data monitoring, localization support, scheduling, and distribution tools within any internal or commercial app. With easy-to-use designers, designed for self-service BI, Wyn offers limitless visual data exploration, allowing the everyday user to become data-driven while revealing trends and telling the story behind the data. And no user fees, means limitless growth.

similar_products.short_desc: #1 Cloud-Native Financial Management System. Achieve real-time visibility, drive efficiency through automation, & grow with confidence.
similar_products.features: Sage Intacct's cloud-native financial management system automates financial processes and captures data in real time so you can make agile data-driven decisions. Transform your business strategy with trusted insights from a partner who thrives off of automation. AI fuels our ability to continuously monitor transactions, automate routine tasks, and even make recommendations. These features are seamless, working in the background while you focus on what matters most-driving your business forward.

similar_products.short_desc: Y42 is the first scalable data platform that anyone can run for loading, transforming, visualizing, offering both no-code and SQL.
similar_products.features:
Y42 is the first scalable data platform for loading, transforming, connecting, visualizing and sharing, offering both no-code and SQL.

The end-to-end platform runs on top of your own BigQuery data warehouse and empowers analysts and savvy business users to build scalable data pipelines and reports.

Integrate hundreds of data sources and automate your reporting via drag and drop.

Data engineers love Y42 as it frees up time to focus on impactful developer tasks rather than fixing reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Toucan is a cloud-based, guided analytics platform built to reduce the complexity of bringing insights from data to business users.
similar_products.features:
Toucan is a cloud-based, guided analytics platform with one goal in mind: reduce the complexity of bringing insights from data to business users. 

The Toucan team has worked from day one to make every experience on the platform simple, fast, and understandable even for complex tasks. As a result, Toucan sees the highest user adoption in the industry at 90%.

Toucan is designed for business leaders and business analysts who need to make decisions quickly and on any device.

similar_products.short_desc: Dundas BI is a fully customizable business intelligence and data visualization platform with dashboards, reporting and data analytics.
similar_products.features: Dundas BI is a business intelligence and data analytics platform for Software Vendors and enterprise organizations. Our fully customizable BI platform gives you instant access to real-time data and information from across your organization, so you can transform it into interactive dashboards and reports for faster insight into your entire business. Dundas BI  was designed to be embedded into your existing applications and portals for a great user experience. Free trial or live demo available.

similar_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.
similar_products.features: Informer 5 is a robust, embeddable data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing data. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

similar_products.short_desc: Longview Tax helps tax departments shift their focus from gathering and collecting data to validating and analyzing outcomes.
similar_products.features: Longview Tax helps tax departments shift their focus from gathering and collecting data to validating and analyzing outcomes. Closely connected to finance systems, Longview Tax is intuitive, easy to use, and designed for the specific needs of tax professionals, allowing them to manage their own system.

similar_products.short_desc: Ortto is a customer data platform, business intelligence tool, and marketing automation all-in-one.
similar_products.features: Ortto is the product-led growth engine that helps businesses acquire and retain customers. Since 2015, Ortto has empowered over 10,000 companies with their software. Ortto allows online businesses to unify their customer data with their CDP, segment key audiences across the customer lifecycle; activate these audiences with personalized, omnichannel experiences, and analyze their business for growth with a powerful suite of BI tools. The teams at Microsoft, Bltly, Typeform, LiveChat, Greenpeace a

similar_products.short_desc: Intelligent DataOps platform that offers a full portfolio of capabilities for orchestration, automation and analytics.
similar_products.features: Composable DataOps Platform is a full-stack analytics platform, with built-in services for data orchestration, automation and analytics, that accelerates the development of data-driven applications. It serves as a coherent analytics ecosystem for business users that want to architect data intelligence solutions that leverage disparate data sources, live feeds, and event data regardless of the amount, format or structure of the data.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Dashboard software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Dashboard tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Dashboard software allows you to connect data from different systems and applications in one centralized interface. Business intelligence leads can use Dashboard software to show correlations and connections between disparate data. These systems provide opportunities for valuable business insights, productivity, and improved efficiency. Businesses interested in Dashboard software may also benefit from Business Intelligence software, Business Performance Management software, and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Visualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Visualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Visualization software helps companies present information in an organized, graphical and easily searchable manner. This type of software is designed to integrate with existing applications and use data to build visual presentations. For related software solutions see Business Intelligence software, Knowledge Management software and Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Decision Support software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Decision Support tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Decision Support software facilitates the decision-making process by helping to prioritize objectives, evaluate alternatives and simulate results. Functionality within this type of software includes data visualization, decision trees, decision tables and scorecards. Decision Support software is related to Business Intelligence software, and Business Performance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Embedded Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Embedded Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Embedded Analytics software allows users to integrate analytical capabilities with the applications they already use and access analytical tools from within these applications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Heatmap software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Heatmap tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Heatmap software uses colors to summarize and present complex data sets in visual form. Common uses are website heatmaps to visualize the most popular (hot) and unpopular (cold) elements of a webpage using color scales, or heatmaps for scientific data analysis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Risk Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Risk Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Risk Management software helps organizations reduce exposure to enterprise and operational risks, improving quality and minimizing losses through better management of data. These solutions track incidents, facilitate evaluation of corrective actions, monitor enterprise-level performance, and promote compliance. Business intelligence and exception management are typical features of Risk Management software. For related software solutions see Financial Risk Management software and Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Text Mining software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Text Mining tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Text Mining software helps companies process text data for everything from research to media monitoring. Text mining software often employs machine learning, natural language processing, customized dictionaries, and algorithms to analyze text. These tools evaluate content for semantics and context to determine sentiment and categorize user responses. If you are interested in Text Mining software, you should also check out Business Intelligence software, Data Extraction software, Customer Experience software, Big Data software, and Content Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Analytics Software enables organizations to track and analyze information regarding their website visitors including who they are, how they found the site, what path they take through the site and the actions they take while there. Using these measurements can help organizations gauge the effectiveness of their marketing and advertising efforts as well as how effectively their website operates as a sales tool. Web Analytic applications can also assist with the process of advertising on the web by evaluating the popularity and effectiveness of keyword search terms. Web Analytics software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.
